text: Mike Mihelic (born March 11, 1973 in Toronto, Ontario) is a former offensive lineman in the Canadian Football League. ==External links== *CFL.ca stats *"Charges dropped against Argos' Mihelic" CBC.ca article Category:1973 births Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Canadian football offensive linemen Category:Canadian people of Slovenian descent Category:Canadian players of American football Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Indiana Hoosiers football players Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Winnipeg Blue Bombers players
title: Mike Mihelic
